https://tmrev.io/movie/309692-Clifford's Puppy Days: New Friends, Little Puppy, Big Adventures 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Clifford, the precocious, adorably oversized animated dog (from the popular television series) is a huge favorite of kids from ages 2 to 5. The action here commences when Clifford is just a cute little red bundle of fur. In this episode, a young Clifford discovers how to have some raucous fun in the new (to him) neighborhood. Clifford's Puppy Days: New Friends, Little Puppy, Big Adventures
